meanings.sent1: The talcier rock felt smoother than the others.
meanings.sent2: Her skin became talcier after using the new lotion.
meanings.sent3: The talcier soap made him slip in the shower.
meanings.sent4: The talcier clouds floated lazily across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The talcier powder left a soft residue on her hands.

meanings.sent1: This talcier cloth is perfect for cleaning delicate surfaces.
meanings.sent2: The talcier snow made skiing more challenging.
meanings.sent3: She joked that the talcier chalk would make her drawings smoother.
meanings.sent4: The talcier moonlight illuminated the garden beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The talcier sand felt cool and soothing under his feet.

meanings.sent1: The talcier paint dried faster than expected.
meanings.sent2: The talcier soil was perfect for planting flowers.
meanings.sent3: He found the talcier makeup gave him a ghostly appearance.
meanings.sent4: The talcier mist enveloped the valley in a soft haze.
meanings.sent5: The talcier feathers floated gently to the ground.
